intension: Design a flyer for a golf tournament with an inspirational quote from Bobby Jones.
globalcaption: The image features a golf course with a golf ball and a golf club prominently placed on the grass. The golf ball is positioned near the center of the scene, while the golf club is located towards the left side. The golf club appears to be a putter, and the golf ball is in the process of being hit. The scene captures the essence of a golf game, with the player preparing to make a shot.
keywords: activity, championship, club, competition, game, golf, hobby, leisure, match, sport, tournament, flyer

bglayer.bgcaption: The image features a close-up view of a green golf course, focusing on the grass and the sand. The grass appears to be a mix of green and brown, while the sand is a mix of brown and white. The scene is captured in a square format, with the grass and sand filling the entire frame

objlayer.objcaption: The image features a golf course with a hole in the middle of a green field. A golf ball is placed on the ground, positioned close to the hole. A golf club, specifically a putter, is also present in the scene, lying on the ground next to the golf ball. The golf ball and club are the main focus of the image, capturing the essence of a game of golf
